author: schneiml
body:
#### PR description:
Fixes as requested by @smuzaffar (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28612#issuecomment-575018934).

I fixed some of the DQMIO tools (hope they still work in Python2, PR tests should show), and removed the ones based on `root2sqlite` because it seems to complicated to fix. This is not a big loss, as I replaced them in #28622 anyways.

#### PR validation:

Test pass in PY3 IB.
title: DQM: fix tests for Python3
